description:
Enjoy the chaotic competition alone or with your friends. Up-to 60 online players in a showdown party and only one who can get the victory. Play as Brokkoli to activate the traps or avoid them as a juicy food and win the rounds.

DELUXE Edition includes:
-Base Game.
-All tracks unlocked.
-BattlePass Season 1 Premium path unlocked.
-Offline mode.
name: Bro Falls DELUXE
intro: Bro Falls is an asymmetric massively multiplayer party game with chaotic elements, trap activations, and big Falls.
